edge: Jaswinder meets Sally in America and marries her for his visa, but forgets the promise he made to his parents.
Jaswinder promises his parents that he will return soon and set his sister's marriage, but marries Richa in America instead.
Flower meets Richa when she follows Jaswinder to New York and inspires her to become a modern girl in her appearance.
Jaswinder strongly detests the idea of being married to Richa, but later falls in love with her and doesn't want to be separated from her.
It is not clear whether Sally finds out about Jaswinder's second marriage or not.
